thinking.title: Interdisciplinary Thinking
thinking.description: Using systems theory to compare human body and society, applying first principles to critique education systems, using blockchain thinking to reconstruct talent evaluation. Building profound connections between seemingly unrelated fields.
thinking.keywords: Systems Thinking, Education Critique, Ramanujan Manifesto, Decentralized Education

product.title: Product & Process
product.description: From PRD writing to 6-8 week MVP landing, complete processes from user research to gradual releases. Sharing real 0-to-1 product building experiences, rejecting armchair theorizing.
product.keywords: PRD, Development Process, MVP, Agile Development, Product Design

tools.title: Practical Toolbox
tools.description: Plug-and-play Prompt templates, labor rights action packs, and problem-solving reports. Knowledge is not just power, but also a weapon. These tools hope to help you in critical moments.

manifesto.title: Ramanujan's Revenge: A Manifesto for a Decentralized Republic of Talent
manifesto.description: When genius is killed by failing English, when students chase meaningless credits, when education becomes domestication‚Äîit's time for change. Not reform, but revolution.

web.title: The Evolution of Web Architecture: From Static Pages to Decentralized Applications
web.description: Understanding 30 years of evolution: from Apache to smart contracts, from centralized databases to IPFS. Know where we stand today, foresee tomorrow's architecture.

labor.title: Labor Rights Action Pack: A Practical Guide for Every Worker
labor.description: No contract? Unpaid wages? Fake job posting? From evidence collection to arbitration process, from demand letters to operation templates. Knowledge is a weapon, and this pack hopes to help those in need.

siteOrigin.title: Why This Site
siteOrigin.subtitle: Knowledge Management ¬∑ Cognitive Enhancement ¬∑ Theory Building
siteOrigin.quote:
This knowledge base was born from the pursuit of systematic learning.

In an era of fragmented information, I choose to systematically organize what I learn, think, and realize. This is not just personal learning notes, but an experimental ground for cognitive enhancement‚Äîthe process of weaving scattered knowledge into a theoretical network.

Here, every article is a crystallization of thinking, every theory is validated through practice. This is my digital brain and a platform for exchanging ideas with like-minded individuals.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A full-stack developer & Web3 explorer who believes in work over credentials

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a full-stack developer with a deep passion for blockchain technology and decentralized applications. From diving into Web3 after graduation to becoming a DeFi quantitative trading system developer, I've maintained curiosity and enthusiasm for new technologies. In the AI era, I believe technical boundaries are being broken, and true value lies in what we can create.

exploration.title: Exploration Phase
exploration.description: After graduation, I chose to deeply study blockchain, Web3, and cryptocurrency, learning Rust programming and practicing my understanding through crypto trading. Despite experiencing contract liquidation, this setback didn't shake my belief in blockchain technology.

defi.title: DeFi Quantitative System Development
defi.description: With solid Rust fundamentals and deep blockchain understanding, I successfully joined a technical team focused on DeFi quantitative trading, participating in multiple high-frequency trading system developments.

project1.name: Solana Arbitrage Bot
project1.description: Developed data monitoring service using Rust, listening to Solana blockchain pool data via gRPC protocol to provide real-time data support for arbitrage strategies.

project2.name: Telegram Trading Bot
project2.description: Developed sniper trading bot for automated trading strategy execution.

transformation.title: Transformation in the AI Era
transformation.description: Through high-frequency use of AI-assisted programming in daily development, I deeply feel that AI technology is redefining the software development industry. AI has broken traditional technical knowledge monopolies and lowered cross-domain learning barriers. After extensive technical exploration, I decided to focus on frontend development to build a solid foundation for full-stack development.

purpose.title: Project Purpose
purpose.description: The original intention of creating this knowledge base was to document my thinking and learning journey, building my own knowledge system. In the age of information explosion, I believe systematic knowledge organization and deep thinking are more valuable than fragmented information acquisition. This is both my digital brain and a platform for exchanging ideas with like-minded individuals.

points.title: Systematized Knowledge

points.title: Open Sharing
points.description: Believing that knowledge value lies in flow and sharing, not monopoly and closure
